useCase.name: Process Fault Management
useCase.description: Manage the fault management process for generating and retrieving reports

successEndConditions.condition: The fault management report is retrieved successfully

mainSequence.step: Buyer/Client requests creation of a new Fault Management Job
Fault Management Job is set to in-progress state
Data for the job is generated
Fault Management Report is created and set to in-progress state
Data for the report is collected
Buyer/Client retrieves the Fault Management Report
Fault Management Report content is returned to Buyer/Client
